漮字的基本解释

漮
kāng
水虚；水的中心有空处。
古河名，在今中国河南省伊川县。

漮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kāng］
［《廣韻》苦岡切，平唐，溪。］
(1)水虚。
(2)水名。在今河南省伊川县西南。

漮字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　漮； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页647第04
【唐韻】苦岡切【集韻】丘岡切，?音康。【說文】水虛也。【詩·小雅】酌彼康爵。【箋】康，空也。漮康音義同。　又水名，在伊闕。

漮字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
漮字的起名意思

指水的中心有空处，也指古河名。

Tong
Basic explanation of words
Tong
kāng
Water is empty; there is space in the center of the water.
The name of Furukawa is in Yichuan County, Henan Province, China.
Tong
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kāng］
["Guangyun" Kugang cut, Pingtang, Xi. ]
(1) Water deficiency.
(2) Water name. In today's southwest of Yichuan County, Henan Province.
Tong
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　漮; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 647 04
[Tang Yun] Kugang cut [Ji Yun] Qiu Gang cut,? Yinkang. [Said the text] Water is also empty. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Choose Bi Kangjue. [J] Kang, Kong Ye. Taokang has the same sound and meaning.　Also named as water, in Yique.
Tong

Character evolution: Xiaozhuan

Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
Tong
Name meaning
Refers to the open space in the center of the water, and also refers to the name of the ancient river.
kāng
1) вм. 康, 糠 (пустой, полый, особенно о пузырьках воды)
2) (сокр. вм. 漮水) Каншуй (река на террит. нынешней пров. Хэнань)
